title: Switch Hits Electrical Switch Plate Wall Plate 1 Duplex | Single Outlet Cover Receptacle Plug Face Plate | Decorative Recycled Vermont Slate - Natural Earth Tone | 1 Gang, 3.25” W x 5” H
features: ✅ Natural Earth Tone - Switch Hits’ Recycled Vermont Slate switch plate covers are a rock-solid choice for any decor. Whether for light switch replacement or new installation, the natural earth tone of these decorative wall plates stands out providing a perfect finishing touch to your interior.

✅ Unique Design, Modern Elegant Look - Each plate is unique, showcasing the natural patterns found in this genuine Vermont stone. They are your ideal kitchen switch plate covers and complement the appliances, bathroom, fittings, tiles, bedroom, living room furniture, and a variety of accent walls.
✅ Premium Craftsmanship - Switch Hits authentic Vermont slate gang plate covers are crafted from hand-cut stones by our artists. The range of shades will vary due to the source of the slate.
✅ Easy to Install - The simple DIY installation takes only a minute to provide an excellent substantial facelift in minutes. Switch Hits outlet covers come with coordinating screws.

✅ Configuration & Size - The Vermont slate faceplates are available in various configurations to complete your project. Our 1 Duplex receptacle wall cover features chipped edges, a concave back, and measures 3.25" w x 5" h, ideal for most applications.
description: Overlooking the tiniest details, like the electrical switch plate and outlet cover can ruin your renovation project. Installing plastic or cheap material light switch covers does the job. Still, it does not provide the modern and elegant look that you would appreciate at the end, nor does it complement your interior decor. Switch Hits specializes in exclusive decorative electrical switch plates and outlet covers. Our authentic Recycled Vermont Slate collection is a genuine slate multi-gang box faceplate cover that is a rock-solid choice for any decor, especially those featuring earth tones - though they can complement modern materials as well. Each plate is unique, showcasing the natural patterns found in this genuine Vermont stone. With both a look and feel that are genuinely from nature, these hand-cut pieces are perfect additions to country homes and ones that could use a tiny part of nature. Best of all, a variety of electrical outlet cover plate configurations are available, including toggle, GFCI rocker/decora/decorator, duplex outlet cover, cable, and blank plates in single to multiple gangs to complete any project. For new installation or replacement, our decorative gang plates have won the love and trust of our customers for over two decades.
